metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0891 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A heap buffer overflow in ExtractImageSection function in tiffcrop.c in libtiff library Version 4.3.0 allows attacker to trigger unsafe or out of bounds memory access via crafted TIFF image file which could result into application crash, potential information disclosure or any other context-dependent impact

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-0891` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.3.0-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.3.0-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.3.0-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.3.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.0-1ubuntu0.1').
